p: Among the 590 patients with suspected HFMD admitted to Yan'an Hospital Affiliated to Kunming Medical University (Kunming, China) between January 2015 and December 2016, the positive rate of an enterovirus nucleic acid etiology was 60.8% (359/590). The pathogen composition of 359 enterovirus nucleic acid-positive cases is shown in Table V. The age and sex composition of 50 EV71-positive cases is shown in Table VI.
